SELECT /* mapper.erd.word.selectWordDetail */ REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(GROUP_CONCAT(WRD.WORD ORDER BY WRD.NO), ',@', ''), '@', ''), ',', '_') AS ABBR FROM (SELECT WRD.GRP, WRD.NO , CASE WHEN #{OBJ_TYPE} = 'ENTITY' AND PJT.ENTITY_CAPITALIZE = 'UPPER' THEN UPPER(WRD.WORD) WHEN #{OBJ_TYPE} = 'ENTITY' AND PJT.ENTITY_CAPITALIZE = 'LOWER' THEN LOWER(WRD.WORD) WHEN #{OBJ_TYPE} != 'ENTITY' AND PJT.ENTITY_CAPITALIZE = 'UPPER' THEN UPPER(WRD.WORD) WHEN #{OBJ_TYPE} != 'ENTITY' AND PJT.ENTITY_CAPITALIZE = 'LOWER' THEN LOWER(WRD.WORD) ELSE WRD.WORD END WORD
FROM (SELECT A.GRP, A.NO, NVL(WRD.ABBR, A.WORD) AS WORD FROM (SELECT 'A' AS GRP, NO, WORD FROM (SELECT NULL AS NO, NULL AS WORD
UNION ALL SELECT #{index} AS NO, #{item} AS WORD
) A WHERE NO IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NO ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT WRD.PROJECT_ID, WRD.WORD, WRD.ABBR FROM WORD WRD WHERE WRD.PROJECT_ID = #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID} )WRD ON A.WORD = WRD.WORD ) WRD , (SELECT PJT.ENTITY_CAPITALIZE, PJT.COLMN_CAPITALIZE FROM PROJECT PJT WHERE PJT.PROJECT_ID = #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID} ) PJT ) WRD GROUP BY WRD.GRP
mapper.update: INSERT /* mapper.erd.word.insertNewWord */ INTO WORD ( PROJECT_ID, WORD_ID, WORD, ABBR, ENGLISH, WORD_DESC , FRST_INS_DT , FRST_INS_USR_UID , LAST_UPD_DT , LAST_UPD_USR_UID , LOG_ID , CHG_CTNT ) VALUES ( #{SESSION_PROJECT_ID} , UUID() , #{WORD } /* WORD */ , #{ABBR } /* ABBR */ , #{ENGLISH } /* ENGLISH */ , #{WORD_DESC } /* WORD_DESC */ , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP /* FRST_INS_DT */ , #{SESSION_USR_UID } /* FRST_INS_USR_UID */ , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP /* LAST_UPD_DT */ , #{SESSION_USR_UID } /* LAST_UPD_USR_UID */ , #{LOG_ID} , CASE WHEN #{WORD} != #{ABBR} AND #{ABBR} IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('단어 "', #{WORD}, '(', #{ABBR} ,')"이 등록되었습니다.') ELSE NULL END )
